original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ vācenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ tiracchāna vijjam vācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ vācessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ tiracchāna vijjam vācessanti sā iyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ tiracchāna vijjam vācessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ vācentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ tiracchāna vijjam vācenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ vācessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ tiracchāna vijjam vācessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchāna vijjam vāceyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: padena vāceti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: padena vācā iti pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa
akkharāya vācā iti akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassa
